page.title: 07THE OLD ARMOURY,LLANGOLLEN.
page.content: The{Old Armoury}is situated in Regent} Street.It was built in the 1660's as a shire hall.In the 1870's it became the home of the{Denbighshire Yeomanry. After years of neglect, in 1947 it became the headquarters of the {International Musical Eisteddfod.}The committees of the Eisteddfod meet in the building during the year to plan the Eisteddfod.In the Eisteddfod headquarters they sell things such as records,tickets etc... The only paid people who work at the headquarters are a full time and part time secretary.All the others work on a voluntary basis.The people who work there arrange accomodation for competitors with families in {Llangollen}and nearby villages, such as{Corwen,Chirk,Glyn Ceiriog}etc... 1,500 competitors come to Llangollen from overseas,and 2,000 from Britain.
